thread.title: love1994
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by love1994

author: love1994
title: love1994
text:
I had trouble starting my car today. I kept blowing & blowing & it locked me out a couple times & it was a hassle. I finally got it started & made it home then gave the company a call. I was then put on the line with Bobbie Hennig. She was by far the most amazing customer service rep I have ever had in my life, not just with this specific company. She expressed great concern & slowly walked me through every step she asked me to do. She was paitent, kind, & understanding. I would highly reccomend her to anyone! She also had a great sense of humor which helped in me calm down in my aggregated state of mind. I couldn't help but take the time out of my busy day to write her this review. Bobbie is a great aspect to the company & should most definitely be recognized for it!
-Jamie B.
-From Maryland.
